Parameters: int: The gravity to convert to absolute (horizontal) values.
getAbsoluteGravity(int, int).Description: Convert script specific gravity to absolute horizontal value. if horizontal direction is LTR, then START will set LEFT and END will set RIGHT. if horizontal direction is RTL, then START will set RIGHT and END will set LEFT.

ClassDesc: Compatibility shim for accessing newer functionality from https:##developer#android#com@B_android#view#Gravity_E@.
